hello guys any experience here having problem with using Deals API.. limit only is 100, is there any way how we can call more than 100 so my data will display perfectly :disappointed:

<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals?limit=100>

Hello everyone!
I am looking for some help.
we have some properties in the record listed in Objects(Custom Link under CRM Menu) and if that property is updated, then we need to push that property data along with the contacts associated with that record it to third party system, or how can we get the contacts of that particular record.
I have checked API docs, and coudn't find anything related to it.

Hi,

I am working with a client would like to confirm the following are possible through the API before we start the project, should be fairly simple!

1. We have some custom objects (e.g. Organisations), which has its own fields. We need to be able to read some of those properties. Can you confirm we would need to call /crm/v3/objects/{objectType}/{objectId}, which would return a json with a properties field, which would contain the custom field field?

2. Similarly, they have some custom fields on a Contact. Can you confirm we can retrieve these from /crm/v3/objects/contacts/{contactId}}, which would return a json with a properties field, which would contain the list of custom properties?

3. We also need to be able to see which contacts are in which organisation (via associations). Can you confirm we can view these in the responses from the above questions? I.e. we can see the associated contacts from the organisation, and we can see the associated organisation from the contact.

4. We have member registration on the CMS, we want to use a private app so the users can use that same login for a different backend. Is that possible?

Hi,

I have created a new property in the objectType Company. This new property has a max character limit of 50. However, when querying the info about the property using this API:
`const apiResponse = await HubSpotClient.crm.properties.coreApi.getByName(objectType, propertyName, archived, properties);`

The information about the limit in the character is not provided:

Response:

`HTTP 200`

`{`
  `"updatedAt": "2024-07-02T12:32:03.504Z",`
  `"createdAt": "2024-07-02T12:32:03.504Z",`
  `"name": "resolved",`
  `"label": "Resolved",`
  `"type": "string",`
  `"fieldType": "text",`
  `"description": "Check if the company is resolved or not",`
  `"groupName": "companyinformation",`
  `"options": [],`
  `"createdUserId": "63436410",`
  `"updatedUserId": "63436410",`
  `"displayOrder": -1,`
  `"calculated": false,`
  `"externalOptions": false,`
  `"archived": false,`
  `"hasUniqueValue": false,`
  `"hidden": false,`
  `"showCurrencySymbol": false,`
  `"modificationMetadata": {`
    `"archivable": true,`
    `"readOnlyDefinition": false,`
    `"readOnlyValue": false`
  `},`
  `"formField": true,`
  `"dataSensitivity": "non_sensitive"`
`}`

Has anyone faced the same issue or is there any other way to retrieve that?

<@U01GW2U4WMA> I avoid the SDK because of odd issues that happen like this. I tend to only use axios, taking the curl example and converting that to an axios request. I’m not sure how else to test out to see if this issue happens still unless you test wihtout the sdk to determine if this is an sdk issue or an api issue

I still have no clue what you are asking me to answer. Sorry, but I’ve asked you to give me clarity but you are just saying it is not working for all contacts. That means you have to do work in testing to determine what the issue is, I can’t magically answer this.

Part of being a developer is understanding all the various ways someone can come to your page and move through the flow of what you are asking them to.

Do you have a cookie banner? Are they saying no? Are they clearing out UTM data? Are they manually coming back to the page 12 hours later from their phone instead of their computer? You have to test these situations out and try to replicate the issue. Once you have the issue replicated, then you can solve for it.

All you have said is that it doesn’t work for some contacts. You have to dig deeper into what the issue is if you want to solve it.

The best way to connect a contact with their HubSpot cookie is to send contact information and their HubSpot cookie to the forms api. Look into that, that might help.

As for why you don’t have UTM SOURCE for deal creation via the api, I can’t determine this. You haven’t given me enough information to go off of. Have you determined if the api update is failing/404? Sorry — You gotta do some of the work here if you want someone to help.
I don’t believe there is any official SLA for these

Hi, everyone. Did someone else get this error message when updating a HubDB row?
```{"status":"error","message":"error when updating datatable row 171793224985 in table ******* for portal *******: Position cannot exceed the size of the display index.","correlationId":"f9462d1d-3464-453e-b8e9-f894b08c4294"}```

Hello everyone,
Is there a way to add a notification to a HubSpot users account through API? Like add one to the following tab (see image)

thanks in advance :heart:

Pulling data in increments of 100 and combining results for display is the best solution for this case, Have a look <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals|https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/deals> list with after option

Hi everyone, is it possible in HubSpot to pull data using PUT request? In my case databricks will push data from S3 to HubSpot via put request, if it is feasible? Also can we pull calls, emails, tasks, meetings, accounts which are present in salesforce into HubSpot using the above integration?
One more thing i wanted to know if attachedments related to deals or account in safesforce which can be pushed out to HubSpot?

Thanks in advance
